title: 11 Matching Skirt And Top Sets (Some Pants Too) So Your Back-To-School Wardrobe Can Be Stocked With Easy Outfits
title_page: 11 Matching Skirt And Top Sets (Some Pants Too) So Your Back-To-School Wardrobe Can Be Stocked With Easy Outfits
text: A current celebrity trend that's been popping up both on the red carpet and in street style looks is the matching two piece set AKA co-ords. Whether in a skirt and top combo or a cropped tee and shorts, the look is seriously stylish. Although the celebrity looks have been more summer specific, this trend is definitely perfect for fall. And the fact that the two pieces are already matched together make them the easiest back to school outfit ever — no need to spend any time trying to put together an ensemble before 7am anymore. Happy back to school shopping!
